title: Awarding of the contract for the water supply extension to Dambulla and Kandalama through the Greater Dambulla Water Scheme in the Central Province
decision_details: - The proposal made by Hon. Wajira Abeywardena, the Minister of Internal & Home Affairs and Provincial Councils & Local Government to award the contract for the water supply extension to Dambulla and Kandalama through the Greater Dambulla Water Scheme in the Central Province implemented as a sub - project of the Local Government Enhancement Sector Project, to M/s Squire Mech Engineering (Pvt.) Ltd. for a sum of Rs.565.39 million as recommended by the Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee (SCAPC), was approved by the Cabinet.
